description: Robinia (T1) - crown thin by approximately  20% by removal of inner 'watershoots' and thinning the branch tips whilst retaining even foliage cover, to reduce shading of adjacent propertiesHorse Chestnut  (T2) - crown thin by approximately 20% whilst retaining even foliage cover, to improve light levels into the inner crown and encourage growth within the crown and reduce shading of adjacent  propertiesRobinia (T3) - reduce northern lateral branches by approximately 2m, leaving  a crown spread of approximately 5m to reduce encroachment onto number 15 Hogarth Way.  Thin remaining crown by approximately 10% whilst retaining even foliage cover to reduce shading of adjacent properties
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
site_name: Garricks VillaHampton Court RoadHamptonTW12 2EJ
